SELECT			L.*, 
				CONCAT(L.LoanPrefix, '_', L.LoanID) AS LoanLookupCaption,
				U.UserSignInName, 
				LS.LoanSchemeName,
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ims_loan AS L
	LEFT JOIN	sphp_user AS U ON U.UserID = L.UserID
	LEFT JOIN	ims_loanscheme AS LS ON LS.LoanSchemeID = L.LoanSchemeID
	LEFT JOIN	(
		SELECT			LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate,
		FROM			ims_loantransaction AS LT
		WHERE			LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate >= @ProcessStartTime
			AND			LT.LoanID = LLoanID
		ORDER BY		LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate ASC
		LIMIT			1
	)
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = L.YID*/
 WHERE 1 = 1  ORDER BY LoanID ASC  LIMIT 0, 50

args:
SELECT			L.*, 
				CONCAT(L.LoanPrefix, '_', L.LoanID) AS LoanLookupCaption,
				U.UserSignInName, 
				LS.LoanSchemeName,
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ims_loan AS L
	LEFT JOIN	sphp_user AS U ON U.UserID = L.UserID
	LEFT JOIN	ims_loanscheme AS LS ON LS.LoanSchemeID = L.LoanSchemeID
	LEFT JOIN	(
		SELECT			LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate,
		FROM			ims_loantransaction AS LT
		WHERE			LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate >= @ProcessStartTime
			AND			LT.LoanID = LLoanID
		ORDER BY		LT.LoanTransactionPayableDate ASC
		LIMIT			1
	)
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = L.YID*/
 WHERE 1 = 1  ORDER BY LoanID ASC  LIMIT 0, 50
